name: Gem-Knight Lady Rose Diamond
text:
1 "Gem-Knight" monster + 1 Fairy monster
The first time a "Gem-Knight" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by card effect during each opponent's turn, it is not destroyed. When your opponent activates a monster effect during your turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Gem-Knight" card from your GY, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; destroy it.
